text: basa! Tene tena palanahare uttama rite kabula kari ane tenum bharana-posana uttama rite karyu, tena khabara antara mate jhakariya (a.Sa.) Ne banavya, jyare pana jhakariya (a.Sa.) Tenina kamaramam jatam tenini pase roji jota, te savala karata he marayama! A roji tamari pase kayanthi avi? Te javaba apati ke a allaha ta'ala pasethi che, ninsanka allaha ta'ala jene icche puskala roji ape che
